name: Relevant Product Category Widget
author: SiteGevonden.nl

sections.description: This is a very lightweight plugin that gives you a widget or shortcode which shows a list of all relevant product categories in a search query. It’s kind of like the regular ‘product categories list’, but optimized for search result pages.
sections.faq:
How does it work?

  • Install the plugin
  • Go to appearance –> Widgets
  • Select ‘Relevant Product Categories Widget’
  • Fill in the title i.e.: “Relevant categories:”
  • Make sure the sidebar where you placed the widget is enabled
  • Search for a product! It should show the correct product categories.

How can I use the shortcode?

Pick the shortcode block in the block-editor and fill in this shortcode: [relevant_categories]

short_description: A widget that displays all relevant product categories for a given search result. Shortcode: [relevant_categories]
